subject: for Frank and Chuck Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: That's Why!
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I got the one shortwave model kinda working, I couldn't tell if it 
just wasn't very sensitive, or the bands were just down. I have taken 
any more time to play with it lately. 

 I guess everyone would have their own style or appoach to boxes, so 
maybe it's time to drop the question of questions. 

 Frank
